A method of evaluating assets using technical indicators, calculations and candlestick patterns
A method of evaluating assets using technical indicators, calculations and news
A method that helps people make money easily

The upper wick/shadow
The Buying wick/shadow
the open price
the close price

how does a candlestick chart differ from a bar chart?
Candlestick charts display the high, low, open, and close prices of an asset while bar charts only show direction and strength
Bar charts display the high, low, open, and close prices of an asset while candlestick charts only show direction and strength
Candlestick charts and bar charts and different names for the same thing

the close price

individual traders personal trading style.

A series of lower highs and lower lows.
a series of higher highs and lower lows.
a series of lower highs and higher lows.

This pattern indicates a potential reversal from a bearish to a bullish trend.

NONE
What does the morning star pattern look like?
It is composed of a large bearish candlestick, a small bullish candlestick, and a large bullish candlestick, in this order.
It is composed of a small bearish candlestick, a large bullish candlestick, and a small bullish candlestick, in this order.
It is composed of a small bearish candlestick and a large bullish candlestick.
morningstar

This pattern indicates a potential reversal from a bearish to a bullish trend.

What is the shooting star pattern?
A single candlestick pattern with a small real body and a long upper shadow
A single candlestick pattern with a small real body and a long lower shadow

A formation where a large bearish candle engulfs the previous smaller bullish candle
NONE

A bearish continuation pattern
A bullish reversal pattern
A bullish continuation pattern
